PSCT.Base: Send 1 LIGHT Machine Normal or Union monster from your hand or Deck to the GY, and if you do, add 1 LIGHT Machine monster with the same ATK, but a different original name, from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Union Activation" once per turn.
